titleStmt.title: The displaying of the Protestantes, [and] sondry their practises, with a description of diuers their abuses of late frequented Newly imprinted agayne, and augmented, with a table in the ende, of all suche matter as is specially contained within this volume. Made by Myles Huggarde seruant to the Quenes maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Huggarde, Miles.

titleStmt.title: The displaying of the Protestantes, [and] sondry their practises, with a description of diuers their abuses of late frequented Newly imprinted agayne, and augmented, with a table in the ende, of all suche matter as is specially contained within this volume. Made by Myles Huggarde seruant to the Quenes maiestie.
titleStmt.author: Huggarde, Miles.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Caly, within the precinct of the late dessolued house of the graye Freers, nowe conuerted to an hospitall, called Christes hospital],

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Identified as STC 13557 on UMI microfilm, reel 570.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 511 (Bodleian Library copy) and at reel 570 (British Library copy).
